priorVersion.title: CDISC SEND Body Weight Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89962

self.title: CDISC SEND Body Weight Test Code Terminology

definition: Terminology for the test codes concerned with the measurement of body mass.
name: Body Weight Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Body Weight Test Code Terminology

terms.definition: The maternal body weight adjusted for the weight of the gravid uterus. This is derived by subtracting the gravid uterus weight from the total maternal body weight.
terms.preferredTerm: Gravid Uterus Adjusted Maternal Body Weight

terms.definition: The weight of a subject at a specified end point. (NCI)
